language.entry: Hypnotist

A mysterious cloaked abomination. Nobody truly knows why it is here, and furthermore, it's an eldritch abomination from Light knows where, so they don't care as long as it's dead. The mind can be... persuaded however. Nobody that has come across it has been quite the same...

In a battle to the death, this thing would die in 2 seconds from it's pathetically low combat skills. It makes up for it by avoiding the fight altogether with mind games. If you stare into it's eye, it's their choice as to what to do with you.

Despite it's fragility and lack off combat prowess, this cloaked thing is an asset to the sanity of the group it... 'joins'. It uses its power to alter the thinking of its allies into A: being protective of it, B: relaxing and humiliating themselves, or C: becoming barbarically aggressive.
Back Off
Focus
Stay
Protection Placebo
Illusion
Lower Guard
Trance
Move
Back Off
Focus
Stay
Protection Placebo
Illusion
Lower Guard
Trance
Back Off
Focus
Stay
Protection Placebo
Illusion
Lower Guard
Trance
Your... Hands...? I guess...?
How do you upgrade a fleshy tentacle?
"Tentacles"
Close Quarters Combat
Cloak
Shiny Cloak
Priest Robe
Soft Silk Robes
"Entrancement"
Cloak
Back Off
Focus
Stay
Trance
Lower Guard
Illusion
Protection Placebo
Odd Pen
Card Deck
Soft Blanket
Strange Photograph
Pocket Watch
Mind Numbing Crystal
The Hypnotist's Personal Journal
SWEET DREAMS...
PROTECTION
DISTRACTION
STRENGTHEN
I've seen worse.
Uhm... OK?... Did I just do something cool?
This is going well so far.
I feel like I'm getting better at this.
Oh Crap.
Tactical retreat! Run away! AAAAAHHH!!!
Keep those things away from me!
What did I do wrong? Is this going poorly because of me...?
I don't want us to die!
Are... you guys becoming aware...?
Everyone's waking up... What do I do?
S-stop looking at me like that!
Please don't kill me! I'm harmless, I swear!
The room is caving in! Wait... No it isn't... I'm losing my mind!
I want the tension to go away.
There's no tension if I get it over with sooner.
The pain is feeling good. That's... not a good sign.
But I don't even like flagellating...
This is gonna hurt... for me.
THIS IS SOME BULLCRAP!
I hate everything so much right now.
Note to self: Brainwash better minions.
You people need to protect me!
This sucks!
I might need to make you guys forget the expedition ever happened when we finish.
You won't mind if I get more of a cut of the profits, right? Too bad. I'm the master here.
Do what I say!
I want this over. Make it happen.
Can we hurry this up? I'm starting to lose my patience with you people.
Not how I expected this to end...
Why do I keep doing this to people...?
Why can't I have friends!?
Maybe it's for the best if I just stop now...
... I want to go home... I want TO HAVE a home...
-Sings a painfully off-key note-
LAAAAAAAAAA!!!
I am a chicken!
WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!! ROAD TRIP!!!
Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet?
Don't lose your minds! It's almost over!
We can do this!
I feel like I could take on the world! I don't know why though. The mind is weird.
I feel epic! Though I still stand no chance in a physical confrontation, it's still nice to feel.
I think your stress plan backfired.
New objective: survive and conquer.
We can do this! Take them out!
I think we can pull this off.
Catch me if you can!
You can't hit me!
You're not ruining this for me.
I'm not giving up. I've come to far to do that now.
See how they tremble? They're scared of you.
Relax yourselves a little.
Steady your aim. Focus on the weak point.
Empty your mind and focus on the task.
That thing in front of you is the thing you despise most. Kill it.
That thing called you ugly. Make it pay.
If I keep saying to myself I feel better, eventually it'll get better.
Placebo don't fail me now!
Please spare us...
P-please don't hurt us...
I don't like this! We should run while we can!
Why are you looking at me like that?
Stop looking at me like I'm a threat!
Look forward, not at me!
Get it over with...
I'm hurting inside... I always did...
I feel like taking a nap. A dirt nap.
I can fight better than this!
Shut up and listen!
Why do I have to do the heavy lifting?
Hurry up! This is taking forever!
I'm taking my share of profit after this.
I usually have no use for gold, but I'll figure something out.
Where's home...?
Can I stay with you guys after this is over?
I don't like wandering aimlessly all of the time...
LAAAAAAAAAAAA!!! LA LA LAAAA! LAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
-making chicken noises-
The colors are screaming at me! Yay for parties!
Back up!
Keep away from me!
I'm not ready! I haven't made friends yet!
I'm just going to back up now so you guys can focus on the enemy.
I'll be supporting you from back here.
I don't trust you guys not to stab me from behind.
Make me feel something.
I can take a few hits.
I demand that you get behind me for a while. Do as I say.
I want to pet the thingy!
Let me talk to it.
You want to be friends?! YES!
A waltz for one please.
I like the part where I screw up our formation and everything gets challenging!
Protect the princess! Oh wait, we don't have one of those. Pretend I'm royalty!
I'll take the punishment, it's nothing new for me anyway compared to crippling loneliness.
I'll take it. I always do anyway.
A heroic sacrifice might redeem me for this error...
I need time to myself...
I'm just slowing you all down. I'll get out of your way.
I'm so tired... Tired of failures... Of being a failure...
Guess I'll have to deal with it.
Attack! Attack! I SAID ATTACK! Fine, I'll do it myself!
I'll do it myself!
I'm not dying. You go.
Your master demands protection. Get in front of me.
Protect me. With your life if need be.
I can't focus! I can't stop panicking!
Calm down... Try to calm down... WHY ISN'T IT WORKING!?
I need to find an escape route! We can't die like this! Where is it!?
I better keep my eye on you all.
No funny business. I know what you're doing.
I won't let you stab me. I'm not taking my eye off you.
Since when does the master work?
It's the minions' job to do the heavy lifting.
I need time. Go play with the enemy.
I... I'm sorry everyone...
I caused this...
Maybe I'd be happier a pawn than the master...
Hold on! I'm in the middle of solving a fortune cookie!
I'm not ready! Give me more time to pack!
I'm dancing with my friends. Come back later.
Hold up, who's picking these strategies? Me or you?
I'M the master. YOU are the minion.
STOP TELLING ME WHAT TO DO!
Let me instigate combat!
Make me feel alive!
I'm going to enjoy and regret this.
You all suck!
I can do better than that.
Allow me.
Excuse me, but between the two of us, who's the one in control?
No. It's not your choice. It's mine.
I choose my own fate.
I don't know why I bother... but I do anyway.
I should at least try...
I hate this feeling of emptiness... It's like loneliness...
Stop staring at me like that. It's creepy. I said stop. STOP YOU CREEP!
The voices whisper commands... I will obey...
Magical powers activate!
For my friends!
I think a retreat is in order...
Can we go now...?
I'm not ready to die... I never wanted to drag others with me either...
Look into my eye... Obey... You will not hurt me... It didn't work, did it?
I don't like the way you look at me.
You are losing focus... You will do as told... Did that even work?
If you really are aware... Why are you waiting to kill me?
One of you, come over here and punish me.
I tried twisting something but I barely scratched myself.
I'll keep watch. If anyone should get tired, it's me.
I guess I'm stuck with you. I need better minions.
I wish brainwashing made you people smarter, but that's not how it works.
Our enemies make better minions.
Give me your share of food.
I want your money. Give me it. I'll buy something useful with it.
The master goes the spoils.
I want to go home...
This dungeon reminds me of my life: cold, uncomfortable, depressing, and there are mindless zombies in it...
Friends... more like slaves...
I've heard a song about campfires before! Let's do a sing-along!
I love road trips! I get to make friends!
-is making chicken sounds-
Over here! Freah meat!
I'm a healer!... Works every time.
Take me but spare them... Please...
I'm the healer! Hit me! The rest of you run!
I have prepared a speech for our friendship!
-is being incredibly annoying-
I know what you're up to! You're not killing me!
Back off!
Allow me to knock some sense into you.
Know your place!
Yay! I'm a dancer! Watch this!
This bread needs ketchup, can I borrow some of yours?
I feel alive doing this!
This shouldn't feel good! Will sating it make the haze in my mind go away?
I... I can't keep doing this... I'm so horrible... I deserve punishment...
I'm an idiot... There's only one way to get the message across to stop...
-smacks their face against the ground pretending to be a chicken-
MAKE THE SCREAMING AND COMMANDS STOP!
I don't trust your judgement.
What trap are you trying to send me into?
I'm ready. My time has come. If we survive, then... I'll reconsider.
Leave me here... Why aren't you leaving? I gave you an order.
But the violence is right there.
I command you to stay here and fight.
But I'm having so much fun right now...
But I want to keep partying... I never get to do that...
Somebody help me!
I haven't lived my life yet! I'm not ready to die!
They're all ganging up on me, aren't they?
I hate you all!
I need a shield! I don't care whose!
I command you to defend me!
That felt pretty good, but you can do better.
Hit me harder! Wait... That came out wrong...
Looks like I'm it!
I don't like this game!
And they call me a monster.
No. I refuse to be in this particular place for a reason.
I don't want to be eaten by that demon!
Ow! Something bit me in here!
What is wrong with this person!?
I don't want to be calamari!
Save me, minions!
Strike the pot! Strike the pot!
I... found a... friend...
Why not stay with us...?
Live here... forever...
Something's... wrong...
These waters are my home now... I finally have a home...
OH LIGHT THAT WAS TERRIFYING!
Is this my punishment for what I do all of the time...?
This is no home to me!
What is your problem!? You can't just take over other people's- oh wait...
Uh... That never happened. YOU CAN'T PROVE ANYTHING!
How are we breathing underwater anyway?
Help! I'm being crushed by an anchor!
I can breath fine, but this anchor is crushing me!
Minions! I can't move! Help me!
I'm losing sanity! Speed it up please!
If you wanted company, you could've asked instead of CRUSHING ME TO DEATH WITH AN ANCHOR! That's a little counterproductive.
Oh Light...
WE'RE ALL GOING TO DIE!
STOP DOING THAT! YOU'RE MAKING ME-
ARGH!... HELP... PLEASE...
YOU. ALL. SUCK. AT. THIS.
PROTECT ME! PROTECT YOUR-
I'M READY TO STOP BURDENING THE WORLD...
LAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-
Our formation is ruined!
Help! They've got me!
...Oh that's going to ruin everything, isn't it?
This is irritating!
Stop that!
Uh, I hate to interrupt, but more are coming.
Attack now or we will be swarmed! Minions! CHARGE!
This is BORING!
I know you all need healing, but you'll need more if you don't hurry up.
Comrades! Focus our attack on the behemoth!
Well this feels familiar. A weakling commanding stronger minions.
Leave the piglet be for the time being! We have bigger problems!
Not the eye!!!
Take cover!
It's too much to hope for a miss! Take cover!
OK, let's try that again.
He'd be useless if I could get my gaze upon him...
WELL CRAP! Minions! Prepare for heavy fire!
Get out here and fight you coward! I know that's hypocritical, but still.
OK... Who can take the hit and live?
Wouldn't it be easier to move two feet in either direction? I guess that'd ruin the fight...
Screw destiny! I'm making my own path!
Something's raining from above! If you say 'justice' I will smack you.
My social life is more stable than this room!
There was no reward there. Believe me.
We might need to return to the hamlet. I don't want us to die from a heart attack...
This is going horrendously...
This is worse than usual...
I'm trying to keep my spirits high... but is it doing anything?
A withdrawal is nothing to be ashamed of. I'd recommend it, but I'm not a tactical genius.
This is going great so far!
It makes me feel great to see everyone so calm and confident!
I guess I must be doing something right for things to go this well.
Mental health is very important. Maybe as much as regular health.
So what're you going to do with your share of the money?
Please don't die... You're the closest I have to friends...
We have to treat these wounds fast!
We need a doctor.
There must be something I can think of to fix this...
If we have to run, so be it.
Is anyone hurt?
Everyone seems fine physically, so that's good.
I'm so glad we're all OK!
I hope the placebos were helpful.
We've got this! Don't let up now!
Someone help me... Please...
I'm not ready to die...
-cough cough- Ow...
I don't feel well... My mind can only do so much...
I hate being a liability... I want to be an asset and help you guys...
I feel fine, but that could change in a heartbeat.
My fragile form is OK for now.
I'm OK. Or at least I think I am. Using mind games on myself can be a bit confusing. I try not to think about it.
Don't worry about your leader. I'm fine.
I feel tired, but that's an everyday occurance. I'm fine overall.
Well, I'm not crazy. So I think I'm OK.
Either everything's great or I'm deluding myself. I'm going with the latter.
I'm OK despite the weirdness around us.
Camping trip! Yay!... I don't get out much, sorry.
Anyone want to talk about something? I'm out of conversation topics.
I'm starting to hear something... I hate that...
Can you hold me...? I'm scared of this place...
I want to go home...
Can I stay at one of your houses for a while? I need a long break after this.
Please don't leave me...
I must be doing something right as a leader!
As a reward for doing so great at this, I think we should relax a bit and play a game.
I think we earned a break. Anyone feel like playing 31?
I like the way this is going!
Alright, followers! Listen up! We will succeed! Do not falter now.
This could be worse, but not by that much...
We suck at this.
I need to work on my leadership skills...
I think the Hamlet is our best option.
Minions, things are terrible, but we can't lose hope. Or we could retreat, I'd be fine with that.
Are we out of firewood? You're telling me we can't just burn down a tree, table, or boat as a substitute?
Last chance for hot dogs!
Bedtime. Go to sleep everyone.
And so the camping comes to an end. I was hoping it would last longer.
We could improvise by adding something else that's burnable to the fire if we need to.
Last call for hot dogs! We don't have much more food after this.
Did we underpack? Or did we not ration our food well?
Please don't tell me that our mission will fail over dinner...
The mind can't do much about the 'drink water within a day or die' thing.
Did someone contract a tapeworm? Where'd all of the food go?... Don't tell me you threw it away for money...
We're rationing our supplies well! This'll last a long while!
I'm glad the food isn't an illusion!... Uhm... It IS real, right?
We have plenty of food in case something goes wrong. Let's keep it with us just in case.
Please don't throw away the food for gold, we bought it for a reason.
Do we really need all of this wood? Can't we forage more from nearby?
We have more wood, right? That means we can camp more!
Why do we only get this much wood for long journeys? Why can't we camp on shorter assignments?
I'll let the fire ease our minds for me... Ahhhhhhh...
You're the closest I've ever had to friends... and you're not even fully conscience...
Everyone in this place needs to be strong to survive. No wonder the outlaws are so devastating.
I'll take first watch. Don't worry, I'll keep an eye out.
I'd make a friendship speech, but those are boring.
Anyone wanna play Old Maid? Or is that too lame?
The sooner we succeed, the sooner we leave.
Let's keep moving. The torch won't last forever.
Let's complete our mission.
Treasure hunt!
Comrades! Forward!
Back to the mission!
OK, let's keep going. I hate standing around for too long.
Wait a minute... Something feels... off.
Stop moving... Do you hear something?
Something's up ahead.
Shhh! Is there someone near?
Ow! Watch your footing!
Why are we walking backwards?
Just turn around! Rotate 180 degrees!
Comrade, I trust you know what you're doing.
This... could be going better.
U-um... Uh... What do I do...?
*begins to panic*
The whispers... NO!
AUGH! H-HELP!
AGH! Not the eye!
HELP ME!
No! Don't leave me!
Thisisbadthisisbadthisisbad!
MEDIC!... Oh wait... That's me isn't it?
You... You can't die like this!
Someone do something!
We need you! I need you!
PLEASE NO!
Don't walk into the light!
Hold on! We can save you!
OH THANK LIGHT!
I'm alive!
I don't want to be left to rot!
I refuse your judgement!
You can make it! Just believe!
Please be careful! Don't let it happen again!
Don't take a dirt nap!
You can't fall into eternal sleep yet! I forbid it!
OW! My flesh!
I feel like I'm about to pass out...
OW THAT STINGS!
Do we have antivenom?!
How... How lethal is this poison?!
At... At least it's not a paralyzing type of poison!
I don't feel good...
The metallic stink burns...
I'm bleeding out! Help!
Help! I'm bad at first aid!
Bandage! Quick! I can't fix this with brain power!
Cough... Oh crap... It's internal...
I'd prefer a lighter room.
The dimmed light is a bit annoying.
Gold is easier to see in darker rooms... For some reason.
I'm not a big fan of the dark.
We're more likely to be surprise attacked in a darker area.
Try not to step in something regrettable, like a trap or beast dung or something equally unpleasent.
Don't we have torches?
Careful, visibility is getting worse.
I can't see anything. Are we going in the right direction?
Light please!
I CAN'T FREAKING SEE ANYTHING! HOW ARE WE SUPPOSED TO FIGHT LIKE THIS?!
Maybe we could try a surprise attack?
Can someone use a torch? Don't tell me we're out.
Well, that's a pleasent surprise!
Yes!
Dang it!
Ack!
That could've gone much worse.
Sometimes boring isn't a bad thing.
I'm not a big fan of alcohol...
Fine, but I'm not touching a drink.
Anyone hear any rumors?
I'm only here for the bard's song.
I'd like to order the venison. No drink.
I choose what I do from here.
Is that a dartboard in the corner? Can I play?
Yes!
I love games!
Shut up and take my money!
Can you teach me how to play?
I... fold.
Let the games begin!
Got anything for only 1 person?
...Wait what?
...A tentacle monster in- NOBODY WANTS TO SEE THAT!
...Is this a sick joke?
...EXCUSE ME?
Can I go anywhere but here, please?
I feel like there's a joke about my tentacles in here somewhere.
THIS IS THE WORST THING!
... The silence is relaxing...
I can think in peace...
The noise subsides... For now at least...
Some peace and quiet to think over the past...
The quiet alleviates me. I hate loud noises.
Journal entry number... What am I at again?...
It's awkward that I can just walk in without causing an angry mob.
Light, keep me and my comrades safe in the coming struggles...
Light, protect my loved ones...
I hate that I have to hypnotize the priest just so I can worship here...
Light bless me, my comrades, my family's souls...
I need to brush up on the holy books.
Is it Sunday already?
OH LIGHT THE PAIN!
ACK! IT HURTS!
My body doesn't have that much blood!
They are not going to like what they see under this robe...
Please go easy on me...
Why did you sign me up for this?!
Is this supposed to make me feel better?
I'm not used to therapy. Is this going to hurt?
... I don't like where this is going!
Why are there leather straps, restraints, and shackles?
I thought I was heading to the therapist, not the prison.
... Am I in a horror novel story? I'm not comfortable with some of these instruments.
Wait! Hold on! I signed up for this! LET GO!
Why are we in the creepy mental asylum again?
Give it to me straight doctor, how bad is it?
Is this going to cost a lot?
Does the medieval fantasy setting have health insurance?
Don't we have a plague doctor or grave robber?
Am I going to die...?
I don't know how I got that.
My friends did what they could, but you're my last hope...
I'd like to chat with the locals at the bar. There might be a new rumor.
Can I go to the bar? They sell food there and I'm hungry.
I'm hungry... I think the bar is still open.
I want to, but I'm low on time to get to the bar and get some news!
I need more liquids inside me, not out.
To the games!
I'd rather play the games.
I feel like playing right now.
...After one more round!
I don't like that game!
That place gets surprisingly quiet when I make the orders.
I'd like a quiet place right now to sleep.
It's like this place when I'm there, except there's pillows.
After a nap, please.
When I get to the brothel, I'll order for solitude and take a nap. I'll be fine then.
I need out of claustrophobic areas right now.
I have a lot of events to pour into my journal right now.
I want to be alone.
I'll be back soon, but first, I need quiet.
Just take me up the hall, two doors away.
I haven't prayed yet today.
I can't distract myself with games, I need to take religion more seriously.
I asked to see nuns, not that.
Down the hall, one door away.
I'll ask for forgiveness during my prayer.
My sins are accumulating... I need to be punished for my failures.
My friends are dead because of me... I need punished!
I've sent people into their own minds as they die... Unaware of their impending death... I... I need punished for that.
I've hypnotized people into eternal sleep... I deserve injury...
Light, I'm sorry...
I almost got jabbed in the eye by a dart earlier. I'm not taking the chance.
Rumors have been useless lately.
I've been accused of cheating! I never cheat!
I should feel complimented that I'm so good they thought I cheated, except now I CAN'T PLAY ANYTHING!
They figured out I've been using the rooms as a hotel and kicked me out.
I don't need this place anyway. Is there an actual hotel around here?... Why is there not a hotel here?
I'm thinking about distressing things. I need a distraction.
...I can't get this problem out of my head.
I'm tired of punishing myself.
I hurt enough! No more!
The caretaker is... kinda... creepy.
I'm human! Trust me!
Is this place suffering from bandit problems?
Where's the nearest restroom? I've been holding it in since I got on the stagecoach.
If the world is destroyed, we all die. I don't understand why so many others help speed it up.
This town needs more... town. Where are all of the buildings?
Does anyone even live here?
The caretaker is... kinda... creepy.
I'm human! Trust me!
Is this place suffering from bandit problems?
Where's the nearest restroom? I've been holding it in since I got on the stagecoach.
If the world is destroyed, we all die. I don't understand why so many others help speed it up.
This town needs more... town. Where are all of the buildings?
Does anyone even live here?
I'll do what I can. I can't fight well, but I'm great in many other areas.
I'm kinda bored.
We can do this!
The world won't save itself.
I am ready to train my mind further.
I'm focused!
I'll leave the choice to you.
Does anyone hear that?
I might not survive the next journey...
Can I take today off?
The whispers... NO! STOP!
I... I will not obey!
GET OUT OF MY HEAD!
I can hear them... Make them stop...
Help me... I'll do anything to make the voices stop- ANYTHING!
I can't focus like this!
Friends... Family... I...
Don't... Don't send me... I can't even control myself properly...
My head hurts...
I can feel my heart pumping... Too stressed... I need something to distract me...
I'm... So tired...
I...I'm too scared...
I'm a liability...
I'll panic and someone might die!
Please no... I need to forget the trauma first...
No! The others will awaken partway through again!
I can hear whispers...
STOP LOOKING AT ME!
This place is my home now... I guess...
This is my life now...
I'm... so sorry everyone...
Give me your money! I pulled more weight than you!
I'm buying a new cloak. Don't try to stop me!
You better be grateful for what I do.
I've fought better than these people!
Is there anyone that can fight competently around here? I need more minions.
Have you considered leaving? Weaklings.
I need a reminder that I'm alive. Hit me.
Anyone got a bigger book to hit myself with?
The pain causes pleasure... Send me in.
Waltz battle! Let's dance!
Death road to the Hamlet!
I'm 75 percent ketchup! I need more! MORE KETCHUP!
Bull-ring! Not bad!
Any new rumors?
What other foods do you serve here?
I'm not here to drink.
Aw Crap...s.
I've got a full house! Anyone here got something better?
It's time to duel!... C'mon, roll with it!
Go fish.
I want to be alone!
OUT!
I'm using this room as a hotel room.
Ewwww... Everything's all sticky and gross...
Ahh...
What to write about in the journal today...?
The silence...
I think I tangled myself imitating the 'zen' pose...
Light, protect us from the coming evils.
Grant us safety in the coming battles.
Forgive me, for I have sinned...
Guide me Light, I need to know... How do I make friends?
AGH! Oh that's going to stain...
OW! Not there!
Watch the eye! OW!
My flesh is numb...
I feel weird... What did you inject me with...?
So... Tired...
I'm going to lay down now...
Zzz... <mumble>
I can't tell if I'm about to be cured or poisoned.
How do leeches cure disease again?
Eck. This medicine tastes like crap.
It's more effective if it tastes worse, right...?
Am I going to live?
But I'd die!
Light, please do not let this happen!
I'm not ready yet!
My mind can only handle so much!
Let go of me! I WON'T DO IT! NO!!!
I command you to not do that!
I think others could use the experience from that more than me.
Boooooriiiiing!
... Do you lack faith in me that much?
How am I supposed to get better like that?
Give me a harder one. I can handle it. With my friends of course.
Trust me, feeling like an overpowering deity is overrated.
You get bored of the curbstomp battles quickly.
I'M UNDER ATTACK! HELP!
EVERYONE WAKE UP! NOW!!!
I've seen worse than what's in the darkest dungeon, but I'd rather not return.
One step closer to the world's salvation. Though, The trauma won't go away easily...
Expeditions aren't so bad compared to the manor!
Anyone wanna play games? I'd like a break after what just happened.
Saving the world is exhausting!
You missed... That's good.
Stop! GET AWAY!
Too much is going on!
WHAT IS HAPPENING!?
You suck at this.
Want a tip? Try doing the opposite of that.
Missed me! Hahaha!
I'm good at this game!
Kill them faster!
Hurry up! I'm sick of this place!
Do better!
I hit harder than that! Try again!
Can I join in your game of tag?
-clucking like a chicken-
Run!!
They're too powerful!
You're all ganging up on me!
No... NO! I command you all to stop this!
Way to aim there, lackey.
I need better minions...
Must I do everything?
It's not my job to kill them. You do it, and do it right!
It takes two to tango. Where's my partner?
I spy with my giant eye, something that starts with-
Please don't die!
H...Help us...
I... I don't know what to think...
You're on break. Allow me to take the hits.
I'll take the pain. I want it.
Stop dying!
Everyone stop getting hit!
Why is everyone fighting?
H-huh?... What is... Where...
We can't dodge forever!
If we stay, we die!
Why did they miss?
Are you teaming up with the enemy?!
You're a really good dancer!
Can you teach me how to move like that? I'd love to learn how to dance well!
-visibly panicking-
Why? What are you up to?
No. It's my choice.
And if you get hit, I get no pain.
I refuse. Respect that and move on.
Stop whining and fight!
Don't waste your time on that! Fight!
LAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
BAWK!
Did you poison it?
I don't trust it.
No. I brought this on myself.
I deserve what I got.
You need it more...
You're wasting your time on me.
Keep that crap away from me!
A ring? I'm not interested in you like that!
Are you hiding something lethal behind that healing ability?
You're lying!
I doubt your claim is valid.
The sting let's me know I'm alive.
I deserve this...
Let me feel the pain.
Don't even bother... I'm not worth it...
Someone else needs it, I'm sure.
No... Just... No...
I don't like pain!
No... NO!!! STAY AWAY FROM ME!!!
Are you coming onto me!?
I command you to put that away.
Back off!
Just go back into the recesses of your mind already, so I can focus.
I'll be fine. Don't bother.
I choose not to use that.
The better our odds, the lower the pain.
Please, use it on someone more deserving...
I don't deserve your kindness...
Just let it end... Then you'll be free...
I'm bored!
No... You... YOU'RE DEAD! GET BACK!!!
I'm going for a nap...
If I'm the one doing the killing, something's wrong.
Did I just do something cool?
I'm nothing like you!
I'm not joining you!
My comrades will destroy you and your thralls!
Shh... It'll be OK.
You will succeed. I am certain.
Calm yourself. Look into my eye, and relax...
Uhm... I have a bandage, but you're on your own from there.
You have really weird anatomy.
Will this make you feel better?
I fear nothing with you by my side.
Believe my words, the enemies are nothing.
Do you want a hug...?
Ahahaha!
You look pretty foolish dancing around like that.
This humiliation will be forgotten when you finish.
Look into my eye...
Go to sleep...
Sweet dreams everyone.
Look into my eye, sleep. When you awaken, you feel strong, powerful, terrifying.
When I clap my tentacles, you will think you are a mighty orc. You will strike hard.
Exercise until you are told to stop.
Protect me during the night. This place perturbs me...
Come over here. I need someone to keep me safe.
Keep me safe please...
I really REALLY love playing games!
I have very few friends because of the way I am...
You all look weird to me in the same way that I look odd to you.
I'm about to die! I still haven't caught up with my game backlog or made friends!
Can we hurry this up? I'm starting to lose my patience with you people.
Why can't I have friends!?
-Sings a painfully off-key note-
I can't think!
I can't focus!
WhatdoIdowhatdoIdoWHATDOIDO!?
Will you kill me when I finish?
I don't think I should.
What... was that sound?
The pain...
Defeat makes me stronger!
Whatever doesn't kill me, makes me stronger.
You get this when you pull your weight.
I might if you do better.
You've not earned it.
Don't waste my time.
How much are you willing to pay for my services?
I don't feel like it.
I... I can't fix this...
You're trust is misplaced...
I'm sorry... I never meant for all of this to happen...
AHAHA!
LAAAAA!
In a minute, I'm saving the world!
No... I cannot...
I'm not a moron. I know what you're plotting.
Don't make me break your brain.
Let me feel alive a little more.
Pain...
You've failed me too many times now. You'll just disappoint me again.
Will you actually do your job?
Give me all of the benefits! And your money! and the food!
Give me everything!
Don't bother... Try it on someone more deserving...
I'd just waste the supplies...
Go away! I want to be by myself!
Get away from me you creep!
Is this... safe...?
This is food...?
My insides ache. Good.
I'm not hungry.
Save it for someone who wants it.
I'm not hungry...
It's tasteless...
No... Save it for yourselves...
Do we have venison? No? Then I'm not eating!
I'll have the steak to go! What do you mean there's no steak?
Friends, I have one final request... KILL IT! DON'T LET THE WORLD BURN! Good luck my friends, and... Thank you...
You just lost any chance of this going peacefully!
End him now my friends!
My friends are better than yours!
Would it be unethical to revive the friends I lost with your magic?... Yeah, probably. Nevermind.
